Question: Sheco Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sheco Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight: Sheco Ark Water Quality Purification Drone

- Sheco Ark-M automates cleaning of contaminants on water’s surface
- All-in-one design for versatility in purifying various pollutants, offering economic efficiency
- Complete autonomy and data disclosure in water quality management system
- Real-time pollutant separation technology for simultaneous suctioning and separating contaminants and moisture
- Enables non-experts to respond immediately to pollution incidents with just 30 minutes of training
- Aims to enter the North American market and conduct proof-of-concept projects for international joint development

Sheco received innovation awards in two categories at CES 2024, aiming to enhance the product and establish a fully autonomous pollution control system.

Sheco有限公司。

CES 2024产品亮点：Sheco Ark水质净化无人机

- Sheco Ark-M自动清洁水面的污染物
- 多功能一体化设计，可以净化各种污染物，提供经济效益
- 完全自治和数据公开的水质管理系统
- 实时污染物分离技术，可以同时吸附和分离污染物和水分
- 只需30分钟的培训，即可使非专业人员立即应对污染事件
- 目标进入北美市场，并进行国际联合开发的概念验证项目

Sheco在CES 2024获得了两个创新奖，在提升产品并建立完全自治的污染控制系统方面有着目标。
